## Pipeline arguments

nextflow run \
https://github.com/openpipelines-bio/openpipeline.git -r main_build \
-main-script target/nextflow/transform/scale/main.nf \
--help

## Table of arguments

| name          | type    | description                                                                               |
|:--------------|:--------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| --input       | file    | Input h5mu file.                                                                          |
| --modality    | string  | List of modalities to process.                                                            |
| --max_value   | double  | Clip (truncate) to this value after scaling. Does not clip by default.                    |
| --zero_center | boolean | If False, omit zero-centering variables, which allows to handle sparse input efficiently. |
| --output      | file    | Output h5mu file.                                                                         |
